trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Irving
There were no other sightings in Irving on or around March 14th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out in my backyard when i suddenly saw a bright red light in the sky. It moved swiftly,quickly, and silently, then came to a stop. It didn't look like any aircraft that i had seen. I got out my phone to record it. After a minute or two, i went to get a camcorder but when i came back it was gone.
Summary: Bright light in the sky, moved unlike a conventional craft, silently
